CustomField.description: Displays the status of the tax.
CustomField.formula:
IMAGE(
CASE( AVA_SFCPQ__AvaTaxMessage__c ,
"Tax Amount Is Up To Date", "/img/msg_icons/confirm24.png",
"Automated Tax Calculation Triggered, Please Refresh Your Browser", "/img/loading24.gif",
"Tax Amount is Outdated", "/img/msg_icons/warning24.png",
"Committed", "/img/msg_icons/confirm24.png",
"", "/img/msg_icons/warning24.png",
"/img/msg_icons/error24.png"),
"")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays the status of the tax.
CustomField.label: Tax Calculation Status
